abstract: More than three-quarters of investors in arbitration are opting for a three-person panel that doesn't have links to big banks, regulators told attendees at the annual meeting of the Public Investors Arbitration Bar Association.
snippet: More than three-quarters of investors in arbitration are opting for a three-person panel that doesn't have links to big banks, regulators told attendees at the annual meeting of the Public Investors Arbitration Bar Association.

headline.main: Investors Opt for Arbitration Panels Without Ties to Wall Street
